name: Super Mario World: Hack 2
overview: Here it is, Hack 2. This was the first place winner in the SMWCentral Summer 2013 C3 contest! Like its predecessor, Hack 2 is filled with several levels with unique gameplay gimmicks and challenges. This time around, each of the ten main levels has two exits, all of which are required to unlock the final level. Unlike its predecessor, Hack 2 is not vanilla.
